cleanup.backupRecommendation: Recommendation: Export database backup before cleanup in case recovery is needed.
cleanup.confirmWarning: This operation will permanently delete all log records from {range} and cannot be recovered.
cleanup.descriptionWarning: Clean up historical log data to free up database storage. Note: Statistics data will be retained, but log details will be permanently deleted.
cleanup.logsDeleted: ✗ Log details will be deleted (request/response content, error info, etc.)
cleanup.statisticsRetained: ✓ Statistics data will be retained (for trend analysis)
cleanup.successMessage: Successfully cleaned {count} log records ({batches} batches, took {duration}s)
cleanup.willClean: Will clean all log records from {range}

description: Manage database backup and recovery with full data import/export and log cleanup.

export.descriptionFull: Export complete database backup file (.dump format) for data migration or recovery. Backup uses PostgreSQL custom format, auto-compressed and compatible with different database versions.

cleanup.description: Physically delete historical log data (irreversible). Statistics table will be retained. Recommend exporting database backup before cleanup.
cleanup.title: Log Cleanup

environment.description: This feature requires Docker Compose deployment. Local development may not support it.
environment.title: Environment Requirements

format.description: Uses PostgreSQL custom format (.dump), auto-compressed and compatible with different database versions.
format.title: Backup Format

merge.description: Retains existing data and attempts to insert backup data. Primary key conflicts may cause import failure.
merge.title: Merge Mode

overwrite.description: Deletes all existing data before importing, ensuring database matches backup exactly. Best for complete recovery.
overwrite.title: Overwrite Mode

safety.description: Before importing, recommend exporting current database as backup to avoid data loss.
safety.title: Security Recommendation

import.backupRecommendation: Recommend exporting current database as backup before proceeding.
import.cleanFirstDescription: Delete all existing data before importing to ensure database matches backup exactly. If unchecked, will attempt to merge data but may fail due to primary key conflicts.
import.confirmMerge: You selected 'Merge Mode', which will attempt to import backup while keeping existing data.
import.confirmOverwrite: You selected 'Overwrite Mode', which will delete all existing data before importing backup.
import.descriptionFull: Restore database from backup file. Supports PostgreSQL custom format (.dump) backup files.
import.streamInterruptedDesc: Import progress did not complete normally. Please check the logs and verify data integrity. Re-import if needed.
import.successCleanModeDesc: All data has been successfully restored. Refresh your browser if the page displays incorrectly.
import.successMergeModeDesc: Data has been successfully imported and merged. Refresh your browser if the page displays incorrectly.
import.successWithWarningsDesc: Data has been successfully imported, but some existing objects were skipped. Refresh your browser or restart the application if the page displays incorrectly.
import.warningMerge: Note: Import may fail if primary key conflicts exist.
import.warningOverwrite: Warning: This action is irreversible, all current data will be permanently deleted!

cleanup.description: Clean up historical log data to free up database storage. Note: Statistics data will be retained, but log details will be permanently deleted.
cleanup.title: Log Cleanup

export.description: Export complete database backup file (.dump format) for data migration or recovery.
export.title: Data Export

import.description: Restore database from backup file. Supports PostgreSQL custom format (.dump) backup files.
import.title: Data Import

status.description: View current database connection status and basic information.
status.title: Database Status

title: Data Management
